        @Deprecated
public HibernateSettings ddlAuto(String ddlAuto)
        已过时。 as of 2.0.1 in favour of ddlAuto(Supplier)
        Specify the default ddl auto value to use.
        参数:
        ddlAuto - the default ddl auto if none is provided
        返回:
        this instance
        另请参阅:
        ddlAuto(Supplier)
